docs.text: Welcome to Longer Vision Robot's Smart Drone Based on Raspberry Pi 5 The full documentation is hosted at https://longervisionrobot.github.io/Raspberry_Pi_5) . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
